text: Dāngshí,[wǒ] duì tāmen shuō:“Nǐmen jiù zhù zài zhè zuò chéngshì [yēlùsālěng] ba! Nǐmen kě suíyì chī chéng lǐ de jiāměi shíwù, nǐmen dāng shuō:“[Ān lā a!] Qiú nǐ kuānshù wǒmen de zuìguo!” Nǐmen dāng fǔshǒu ér jìn chéng mén [zhù], wǒ jiāng kuānshù nǐmen de zuìguo, wǒ jiāng zēngjiā xíngshàn zhě de bàochóu.”
